name: webdriverio-mcp-server
description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server for Web Automation with WebDriverIO and TypeScript

scripts.test: npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:chrome: BROWSERS=chrome npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:firefox: BROWSERS=firefox npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:safari: BROWSERS=safari npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:cross: BROWSERS=chrome,firefox npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:all-browsers: BROWSERS=chrome,firefox,safari npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:observe: OBSERVE=1 OBSERVE_END=1 BROWSERS=chrome,firefox,safari npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:smoke: npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --spec ./tests/smoke/home.smoke.spec.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:a11y: npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --spec ./tests/accessibility/a11y.spec.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:links: npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --spec ./tests/links/link-health.spec.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:forms: npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --spec ./tests/forms/contact-form.spec.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.allure:regen-open: npm run allure:generate && if [ -z "$SKIP_ALLURE_OPEN" ]; then if command -v allure >/dev/null 2>&1; then (allure open reports/allure-report >/dev/null 2>&1 &) ; else (npx allure open reports/allure-report >/dev/null 2>&1 &) ; fi; fi
scripts.postman:test: newman run postman/collections/newsela-public-smoke.postman_collection.json -e postman/environments/newsela-environment.json --reporters cli,junit,json --reporter-junit-export reports/api/newman-results.xml --reporter-json-export reports/api/newman-results.json && npm run postman:to-allure
scripts.postman:test:env: COLLECTION=${COLLECTION:-postman/collections/newsela-public-smoke.postman_collection.json}; ENV=${ENV:-postman/environments/newsela-environment.json}; newman run $COLLECTION -e $ENV --reporters cli,junit,json --reporter-junit-export reports/api/newman-results.xml --reporter-json-export reports/api/newman-results.json && npm run postman:to-allure
scripts.test:all:stack: BROWSERS=chrome,firefox,safari npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts && npm run postman:test:allure && npm run allure:regen-open

author: Development Team
